attributes.action: Make transparent sentencing and upgrade from manslaughter to murder in the second
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Degree, for street robbery homocides.  The criminals are literally getting away with murder. When will the guidlines be changed to reflect a tougher approach to a epidemic of street crime in our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
